dcterms:description: A dataset suitable for supervised binary classification tasks that discriminates between two different independent and identically distributed (i.i.d.) noisy quantum dynamics, where the noise sources have the same support but different probability distributions.
dcterms:title: IID

dcterms:creator: Santiago Hernández-Gómez
Francesco Poggiali
Paola Cappellaro
Nicole Fabbri
dcterms:description: A dataset concerning the classification of two different colored noisy quantum dynamics with the noise sources having the same support but different probability distributions and a transition matrix.
dcterms:title: NM

dcterms:creator: S. Virzí
A. Avella

dcterms:description: A dataset created for the classification between stochastic quantum dynamics affected respectively by an i.i.d. and a colored noise with the same support and probability distribution.
dcterms:title: VS
